citations.desc: INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
***The last semiannual evaluatiion was conducted in the spring of 2018. The semi annual report submitted to the IO
lists 0 deficiencies on facility inspection but does not contain a a description of the nature and extent of the research
facility's adherence to this subchapter. It also does not indicate a program review was conducted.
***There are no signatures on the semiannual report. The reports shall be reviewed and signed by a majority of the
IACUC members and must include any minority views.
***The fall semiannual evaluation was not conducted and there was no semi annual report submitted to the IO.
Semi annual reports shall be updated at least once every six months upon completion of the required semiannual
evaluations and shall be maintained by the research facility.
To be corrected by May 5, 2019.
Exit briefing conducted with the Head of the Department.
